item.description:
Let’s partake in America’s favorite pastime, and take in a ball game at the historic Fenway Park, on its 100th year anniversary.

The game starts at 7.11PM, and usually goes on for 3 hours of regular game time, and more if there are extra innings involved.

The cost of a bleacher’s ticket is approximately $20-30, depending on the seat location. Once I know how many people are interested, I will call Red Sox and order tickets.

About the Fenway Park: http://mlb.mlb.com/bos/fenwaypark100/index.jsp

About Red Sox: http://boston.redsox.mlb.com/index.jsp?c_id=bos

About Blue Jays: http://toronto.bluejays.mlb.com/index.jsp?c_id=tor&tcid=mm_bos_sitelist
item.name: Red Sox Game at Fenway Pahk!
